quranAyahs.ayah: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
quranAyahs.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

quranAyahs.ayah: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: O you who believe, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَا ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
quranAyahs.translation: And if you count the favors of Allah, you will never be able to number them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا * وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ
quranAyahs.translation: And whoever fears Allah—He will make for him a way out, and will provide for him from where he does not expect.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ مُحْسِنُونَ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who do good.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
quranAyahs.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah, then He is sufficient for him.

quranAyahs.ayah: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا ۚ هُوَ مَوْلَانَا
quranAyahs.translation: Say: Nothing will happen to us except what Allah has written for us. He is our Protector.

quranAyahs.ayah: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
quranAyahs.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear.

quranAyahs.ayah: الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَطْمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ ۗ أَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ الْقُلُوبُ
quranAyahs.translation: Those who believe and whose hearts find rest in the remembrance of Allah. Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
quranAyahs.translation: It may be that you dislike something while it is good for you.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا * إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease. Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ
quranAyahs.translation: And He is with you wherever you are.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَمَا تَوْفِيقِي إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
quranAyahs.translation: My success is only by Allah. In Him I trust.

quranAyahs.ayah: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
quranAyahs.translation: For indeed, with hardship comes ease.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
quranAyahs.translation: And say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

quranAyahs.ayah: فَإِنَّ ذِكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: So remind, for indeed reminding benefits the believers.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ رَبِّي قَرِيبٌ مُّجِيبٌ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: And upon Allah rely, if you are believers.

quranAyahs.ayah: ادْعُونِي أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
quranAyahs.translation: Call upon Me; I will respond to you.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّهُ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, whoever fears Allah and is patient—Allah does not allow the reward of the doers of good to be lost.
